Phoneme pairings from learned embeddings¶

Path langsim.modules.cognates.phoneme_pair_weights.embedding_sim
Executable yes

Get phoneme pairing scores, as initialization for the Kondrak model, from similarities of phoneme embeddings.

Inputs¶

Name Type(s)
embeddings PhonemeEmbeddingsDatatype

Outputs¶

Name Type(s)
weights NumpyArray
